subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski, the Sprint Cup points leader, is inching closer to a possible title for team owner Roger Penske and the 300,000 mark for Twitter followers.
snippet: Brad Keselowski, the Sprint Cup points leader, is inching closer to a possible title for team owner Roger Penske and the 300,000 mark for Twitter followers.
